extendedInfo.description: The Progressive Radio Network is an independent, non-commercial radio station dedicated to providing talk and information for the minds that don't conform into a neat, simplistic category. We've gathered some of the finest programming in one place, with a potpourri of shows on topics ranging from health and wellness, to global politics and alternative news, to great music of every genre.Keep up with The Progressive Radio Network on the go -- wherever and whenever, 24/7, with our PRN App!One touch access to: Listen Live Archives and Podcasts of your favorite showsHealth, Politics and Environmental News Featured Progressive Articles Videos As well as our call-in line!Keep in touch with our hosts on Twitter and Facebook, featuring the most empowering, thoughtful and crucial information for these pivotal times.

reviews.title: The Best I\'ve heard, all \'n all !!!
reviews.comment: Free Archives! Truly worth a Perusal... There are many fascinating subjects on most all of these programs, offered 24/7, with times they repeat. Download what you want to hear, again, & transfer those programs to your phone, to listen on the go. THANK YOU GARY NULL for making all this possibke, for those of us HUNGRY for HONESTY & TRUTH, exposing hypocrisy & lies. <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Snake oil salesmen and charlatans
reviews.comment: This \"radio station\" exists to sell Gary Null\'s overpriced juice powders and promote his conspiracy theories.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works but...
reviews.comment: I just want an easier way to download the podcasts to save on battery and listen when I have no svc. This won\'t help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t get it to open on my Galaxy S. Would\'ve loved to have used it. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well (+ suggestion)
reviews.comment: Seems to work well. It would be useful if it also had a program schedule, plus a clock for PRN.FM for better planning for those listening outside your time zone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Now its easier to listen to Gary Null on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best station
reviews.comment: New listener love the reality check I get from this station
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrific!!
reviews.comment: I am very happy about this app for PRN. Terrific idea. I just downloaded it on my Android. What a unique experience!  Thank you!  Dan. S. White
reviews.author: A Google User
